feed.title: Taproot Assets on Mainnet: Announcing tapd v0.3.0-alpha

entry.title: Taproot Assets on Mainnet: Announcing tapd v0.3.0-alpha
entry.summary: In the email, the sender points out that there is a missing citation to their scalable asset transfer work from 2017. They provide a link to their work, which can be found at https://petertodd.org/2017/scalable-single-use-seal-asset-transfer. The sender mentions that the key concepts in universes are very similar to their work. They also provide their contact information as 'peter'[:-1]@petertodd.org.
